item.title: 0826 javascript program to convert saved open firefox tabs for markdown
item.description: link: Small javascript program for node on green using regex to add the bullet markup to the tabs saved by firefox extension.

item.title: 0738 Firefox Multi Account Containers
item.description: Control + FULL STOP For the MAC control panel Control + Shift + [number between 0 and 9] For a new tab in the chosen container (configurable) Right click inside a container tab To assign the site to always open in the container.
